column4: hi my friend configured his laptop to conect internet via a proxy network(in a wi-fi network)but now he has direct connection..his Apt is not working ..PLease tell which .conf file was edited to set proxy for network..
but he has configured them by editing some .conf file doesn't remember which..his firefox is connected but not other applications
ahhh ok then it should be /etc/apt/apt.conf or something in /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/*
we had to authenticate via a wi fi network so he added his username and password too in that file.. any new guesses??
